cities.name: Paris
clues: I am known as the City of Light, where a famous iron tower kisses the sky.
My river banks are home to lovers and artists, flowing through the heart of Europe.
My language is the language of diplomacy, and my fashion sets global trends.
I host the world's most visited paid monument, standing 324 meters tall.

cities.name: Tokyo
clues: I am a neon-lit metropolis where ancient temples meet cutting-edge technology.
My crossing is the world's busiest, a synchronized dance of pedestrians.
I was once called Edo, and my fish market is legendary worldwide.
My tallest tower stands 634 meters and is painted white and orange.

cities.name: New York
clues: I'm the city that never sleeps, with a park larger than some countries.
My lady stands tall in the harbor, welcoming millions to the land of opportunity.
My theater district is world-famous, and my pizza is folded, not forked.
I have five boroughs, but one is an island known for finance and a charging bull.
